indicator_descEN: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
seriesDescription: Total population in severe food insecurity (thousands of people)
age_desc: All age ranges or no breaks by age
footnotes: [2015]: The observation value represents the 3-year average of the period 2014-2016. // [2016]: The observation value represents the 3-year average of the period 2015-2017. // [2017]: The observation value represents the 3-year average of the period 2016-2018.
sources: Food and Agriculture Organisation of the United Nations (FAO), with data collected through the Gallup World Poll.
